ygData.subject: Re: Hi...I am looking for a EQ entusiast (addict) for a TV Interview
ygData.msgSnippet: ... Help . ... get ... phenomenon ... you ... Please tell me that you are not only picking on EQ when there are many other online games out there. UO, DAoC, AC
ygData.messageBody:
--- In EverQuest@y..., "xaltoltan" <adamdreyfus@t...> wrote:
> I am a booker at TechTV and I am looking for an EQ enthusiast
> (addict) for a live in-studio interview on the show 'Call for
Help'.
> We are interested in talking about what exactly EQ is, how people
get
> started, what the allure is and maybe just talk about the
phenomenon
> a little bit. This will be a live interview in our Sna Francisco
> studio so I'm hoping to find someone who lives in the Bay Area and
> would be willing to come on TV. Thank you very much for any help
you
> can render. PLease respond to my email account.
>
> Adam Dreyfus
> Booking Manager
> adamdreyfus@t...

Please tell me that you are not only picking on EQ when there are
many other online games out there. UO, DAoC, AC 1 and 2, Starwars,
etc, etc. Just because EQ was posted on the news doesn't mean $h**.
so I'm just wondering if you're singling out EQ? hehe and I agree
with the previous statement BANNED BANNED BOOT BOOT KICK KICK BITE
BITE LOL

btw to everyone else I lost my password for my new account LOL damn
it lol.

Taqard Tacticz 54 Dwarven Rake of the Rathe
"Lets kill them all!! Let no life be left alive!! Then let us DRINK
TO OUR VICTORY!!! "
